game.name: Telera
game.shortDescription: Roll your dice, and score increasing amounts of points. Complete the goal target to move to the next level - unlocking new dice, and providing resources to upgrade your existing dice. Roll, Score, Upgrade, and repeat - Talera provideds a challenge as long as you can complete each level. Good luck!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roll your dice, and score increasing amounts of points. Complete the goal target to move to the next level - unlocking new dice, and providing resources to upgrade your existing dice. Roll, Score, Upgrade, and repeat - Talera provideds a challenge as long as you can complete each level. Good luck!
